verses.name: Leviticus 14:30
verses.text: And he shall offer the one of the turtledoves, or of the young pigeons, such as he can get;

verses.name: Leviticus 14:31
verses.text: Even such as he is able to get, the one for a sin offering, and the other for a burnt offering, with the meat offering: and the priest shall make an atonement for him that is to be cleansed before the Lord.

verses.name: Leviticus 14:32
verses.text: This is the law of him in whom is the plague of leprosy, whose hand is not able to get that which pertaineth to his cleansing.

verses.name: Leviticus 14:33
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses and unto Aaron, saying,
